version.prov_capabilities_per_version: bsp_gen2 btstack10 btsdk_empty_app hci_loopback spp btsdk_ota_app anc ans batc bats beacon findme helloc hellos hrc hrs lecoc adc gpio lowpower puart pwm dimmer dimmer_self_config embedded_provisioner light_dimmable light_smart low_power_led on_off_switch mesh_switch_smart mesh_snip

versions.name: MyBSP
versions.prov_capabilities: ble br_edr mesh hid ota hal btsdk fw2
versions.description:
Kit Features:
  • CYW20820-based dual-mode (LE/BR/EDR) Bluetooth® 5.0-compliant fully certified module (MyBSP)
  • Arduino compatible headers for hardware expansion
  • User switches and LEDs
  • FCC, ISED, MIC, and CE Certified Module on board (MyBSP)
  • USB connector for power, programming, and USB-UART bridge

Kit Contents:
  • MyBSP
  • USB Standard-A to Micro-B cable
  • Quick Start Guide
